title: Homo universalis
overview: Can you boil an egg? Do you know the difference between left and right? If yes, you can win!Homo universalis is a game show format which is simple and universal in appeal. 100 contestants go head-to-head in a series of challenges with only one rule: DON'T COME LAST.After every challenge, the person who loses must leave the competition, counting down from 100 to just 1. The multi-talented last man standing will take the grand prize home. And have beaten the 99!
